SamPy.cosmology.powerspec.cdm_corr_z2p5¶

SamPy.cosmology.powerspec.cdm_corr_z2p5(rvals, fudge=4.9, sigma8=0.809, omegam=0.272, omegal=0.728)¶

Return the dark matter correlation function at separations given by rvals at z=2.5

rvals in h^-1 Mpc
